metadata.title: CVE-2016-7406 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: Format string vulnerability in Dropbear SSH before 2016.74 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via format string specifiers in the (1) username or (2) host argument.

criterions.comment: dropbear package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2016.74-1').
